relation: My Rifle Is My Best Friend
Say Hello To My Little Friend
Killed all enemy snipers in Sniper Alley without being hit (“Ghosts of Sarajevo”)
Completed any single player mission without using med kits, but taking damage
Completed any act without using medkits
Killed 20 enemies from a distance of 600m or greater
In one multiplayer round killed an opponent with a sniper rifle, sidearm and melee attack
Killed 25 enemies using thermal or night vision goggles
Rescued the friendly (“From Out Of Nowhere”)
Killed Major Vladic (“And Justice For All”)
Killed three or more enemies by shooting a grenade
Completed the Campaign using max one medkit per mission
Retrieved your weapon without being detected (“Burning Bridges”)
Killed 50 enemies while holding your breath
In the final duel with Maddox, killed him with the first shot (“No Loose Ends”)
Killed Maddox once and for all (“No Loose Ends”)
Achieved 100% accuracy in any single player mission
Killed 15 enemies with a stealth kill
Killed all enemies in the beach houses without causing an alarm (“Leave No Man Behind”)
Won 5 rounds in a row in Team Deathmatch
Killed 10 opponents in multiplayer using your sidearm
Took a successful shot from a distance of 1 km or greater
